publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6874 Alasdair Allan: 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuationâ€”That the Parliament notes that 29 August 2010 marks the 80th anniversary of the evacuation of St Kilda when the last 36 islanders were removed from the island at their own request; recognises what is considered to be the huge importance of St Kilda culturally to Scotland and the Western Isles; notes that St Kilda is one of only a few World Heritage Sites to hold joint status for its natural and cultural environments, and believes that the physical beauty, historic traditions and remoteness of St Kilda provides a continuing source of fascination for generations of people around the world. Supported by: Dave Thompson*, Jamie McGrigor*, Anne McLaughlin*, Bob Doris*, Aileen Campbell*, Mike Pringle*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Brian Adam*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Ken Macintosh*, Liam McArthur*
S3M-6874 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuation (lodged on 26 August 2010) Gil Paterson*, Maureen Watt*, Bill Wilson*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-6874 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuation (lodged on 26 August 2010) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-6874 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuation (lodged on 26 August 2010) David Stewart*, Rhoda Grant*
S3M-6874 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuation (lodged on 26 August 2010) Peter Peacock*
S3M-6874 80th Anniversary of St Kilda Evacuation (lodged on 26 August 2010) Angela Constance* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
